author: Special Correspondent
text:
XSEED Education has planned to launch a summer camp and mobile learning App for Grades 5-7 students in the city and Tirunelveli region.

This, first-of-its-kind programme, combines mobile learning technology and personalised coaching to develop fundamental mathematics concepts and advanced problem-solving skills.

XSEED has designed this programme specifically to make it affordable and accessible to every parent who has a basic Android phone. Aspirants can call 1800-102-7200 or visit the XSEED on-the-spot registration desk on Sunday (March 6) at 2 p.m. at Agrini apartments for more details.
title: Registrations open
